TitleEnglish: The Adventures of Qiaohu Big Ship
SummaryEnglish: Qiaohu had a small temper because his mother was busy taking care of Xiaohua's sister. While resolving concerns with her friends, she ran into Squirrel Jinjin, a small inventor from the Green Forest Kingdom. Due to the long-term lack of rain in the green forest, the living environment of the residents is threatened. Jin Jin invited Qiaohu and his friends to go to the Green Forest to design and build a large spacecraft to collect artificial rainfall from the clouds. Qiaohu and his friends collaborated with each other, with tenacious perseverance and the cheering and encouragement of the audience, they overcame various difficulties and finally succeeded. Qiaohu, who grew up after experiencing the adventure, understood the difficulty of his mother, and said aloud his love to her mother.
